languages.text: И повел старый Вени Домин на верхние палубы. И взош{mf|ел|ла} Домин в палаты офицеров. Убраны были стены паутиной сосудов, драгоценные трофеи вплетены в них, а клубки сухожилий сковали статуи. На высоком же балконе стенал расчлененный Судия, пытаясь бледными руками вернуть себя в порядок. Но от движений его все теснее сплеталась плоть, обращала палаты в силок. Таков клинок, что запутался в понимании учения. Обездоленное создание, не знающее места своего в мире.

And the old Veni led the Domin to the upper decks. And the Domin entered into the officers' chambers. A web of veins adorned the walls, entangling the precious trophies, and statues were bound in intertwining sinews. And high upon a balcony, the dismembered Judge wailed as he attempted to reassemble himself with his pale hands. But his movements merely tightened the tangle of the flesh, turning the chambers into a snare. Such is a blade tangled and trapped in misunderstood teachings. A hapless creature that does not know its place in the world.
languages.original_text: И повел старый Вени Домин на верхние палубы. И взош{mf|ел|ла} Домин в палаты офицеров. traits.locale_text: And the old Oa led the Enim to the upper decks. And the Enim went up into the officers' chambers. A web of veins adorned the walls, entangling the precious trophies, and statues were tied in intertwining sinews. And high upon a balcony, the dismembered Judge was wailing, as he tried to reassemble himself with his pale hands. However, his movements were only tightening the tangle of the flesh, turning the chambers into a snare. Such is a blade tangled and trapped in misunderstood teachings. A hapless creature that does not know its place in the world.

languages.text: Und der alte Veni führte {mf|den|die} Domin auf die Oberdecks. Und {mf|der|die} Domin betrat die Offiziersgemächer. Ein Netz aus Adern zierte die Wände, umschlang die wertvollen Trophäen, und Statuen waren mit ineinander verschlungenen Sehnen gefesselt. Und hoch oben auf einem Balkon heulte der zerstückelte Richter, während er versuchte, sich mit seinen blassen Händen selbst wieder zusammenzusetzen. Doch seine Bewegungen zogen das Fleischgewirr nur noch enger zusammen und verwandelten die Gemächer in eine Falle. Dies ist das Wesen einer Klinge, die in falsch verstanden Leeren verstrickt und gefangen ist. Eine unglückselige Kreatur, die ihren Platz in der Welt nicht kennt.
languages.original_text: And the old Veni led the Domin to the upper decks. And the Domin entered into the officers' chambers. A web of veins adorned the walls, entangling the precious trophies, and statues were bound in intertwining sinews. And high upon a balcony, the dismembered Judge wailed as he attempted to reassemble himself with his pale hands. But his movements merely tightened the tangle of the flesh, turning the chambers into a snare. Such is a blade tangled and trapped in misunderstood teachings. A hapless creature that does not know its place in the world.

languages.text: Y el viejo Veni guio a{mf|l| la} Domin a las cubiertas superiores. Y {mf|el|la} Domin entró en los aposentos de los oficiales. Una red de venas decoraba las paredes, enredándose entre los trofeos. Las estatuas estaban atadas mediante tendones entrelazados. Y en lo alto, en un balcón, el Juez descuartizado gemía, intentando recomponerse con pálidas manos. Pero sus movimientos solo reforzaban la maraña de carne, convirtiendo las salas en una trampa. Tal es el fruto de una hoja enmarañada por enseñanzas mal entendidas. Una criatura inerme que no conoce su lugar.
languages.original_text: And the old Veni led the Domin to the upper decks. And the Domin entered into the officers' chambers. A web of veins adorned the walls, entangling the precious trophies, and statues were bound in intertwining sinews. And high upon a balcony, the dismembered Judge wailed as he attempted to reassemble himself with his pale hands. A hapless creature that does not know its place in the world.

Tal es el fruto de una hoja enmarañada por enseñanzas mal entendidas. Una criatura inerme que no conoce su lugar.

languages.text: 老ヴェニはドミンを上層デッキへと導いた。そしてドミンは士官の部屋に入る。壁には血管の網が張り巡らされている。貴重な戦利品が絡まっており、彫刻は縺れあった筋で縛られていた。そしてバルコニーの高みでは、切り刻まれたジャッジが泣き叫びながら、青白い手で自らを組みなおそうとしていた。けれどその動きはただ肉の縺れをきつくさせ、部屋を罠へと変えるばかりだった。間違った教えに絡めとられた刃物のようなものだ。世界の中における自らの居場所を知らぬ無様な生き物。
languages.original_text: And the old Veni led the Domin to the upper decks. And the Domin entered into the officers' chambers. A web of veins adorned the walls, entangling the precious trophies, and statues were bound in intertwining sinews. And high upon a balcony, the dismembered Judge wailed as he attempted to reassemble himself with his pale hands. But his movements merely tightened the tangle of the flesh, turning the chambers into a snare. Such is a blade tangled and trapped in misunderstood teachings. A hapless creature that does not know its place in the world.

traits.locale_text: 老ヴェニはドミンを上層デッキへと導いた。そしてドミンは士官の部屋に入る。壁には血管の網が張り巡らされている。貴重な戦利品が絡まっており、彫刻は縺れあった筋で縛られていた。そしてバルコニーの高みでは、切り刻まれたジャッジが泣き叫びながら、青白い手で自らを組みなおそうとしていた。けれどその動きはただ肉の縺れをきつくさせ、部屋を罠へと変えるばかりだった。間違った教えに絡めとられた刃物のようなものだ。世界の中における自らの居場所を知らぬ無様な生き物。

languages.text: 在这之后，年迈的帷者带领秘者来到了上层甲板。秘者进入了军官所在的房间，墙上遍布血管织成的巨网，将珍贵的战利品缠在其中，无数雕像被系在彼此缠绕的筋腱之中。在高耸的阳台上，遭到肢解的仲裁者官嚎啕大哭，试图用苍白的双手重新将自己拼接起来，但他的举动仅仅拉紧了血肉构成的罗网，将房间变成了陷阱。这把利刃被困在遭到误解的教义之中，这只可悲的生物无法找到自己在这个世界上的位置。
languages.original_text: And the old Veni led the Domin to the upper decks. And the Domin entered into the officers' chambers. A web of veins adorned the walls, entangling the precious trophies, and statues were bound in intertwining sinews. And high upon a balcony, the dismembered Judge wailed as he attempted to reassemble himself with his pale hands. But his movements merely tightened the tangle of the flesh, turning the chambers into a snare. Such is a blade tangled and trapped in misunderstood teachings. A hapless creature that does not know its place in the world.

languages.text: Le vieux Veni conduisit {mf|le|la} Domin jusqu'aux ponts supérieurs. {mf|Le|La} Domin pénétra dans les quartiers des officiers. Les murs étaient ornés d'un réseau de veines enchevêtrant les précieux trophées, et les statues étaient liées par des tendons entrelacés. Du haut d'un balcon, le Juge démembré gémissait en tentant de reconstituer son propre corps de ses mains pâles. Mais ses mouvements ne faisaient que resserrer l'enchevêtrement des chairs, transformant peu à peu la pièce en piège mortel. Ainsi finit une lame piégée dans des enseignements mal compris. Une créature infortunée qui ne connaît pas sa place dans le monde.
languages.original_text: And the old Veni led the Domin to the upper decks. And the Domin entered into the officers' chambers. A web of veins adorned the walls, entangling the precious trophies, and statues were bound in intertwining sinews. And high upon a balcony, the dismembered Judge wailed as he attempted to reassemble himself with his pale hands. But his movements merely tightened the tangle of the flesh, turning the chambers into a snare. Such is a blade tangled and trapped in misunderstood teachings. A hapless creature that does not know its place in the world.

languages.text: Ardından ihtiyar Veni, Domin'e üst güvertelere kadar yol gösterdi. Domin de subay odalarına adımını attı. Damarlardan oluşan bir ağ, duvarları süslüyordu. Kıymetli ganimetlerin etrafından dolanıyordu. Heykelleri iç içe geçen sinir ağları bağlamıştı. Balkonun üst kısmında ise uzuvları koparılmış Yargıç, solgun elleriyle parçalarını bir araya getirmeye çalışırken feryatlar koparıyordu. Fakat hareketleri, kördüğüm olmuş eti daha da gererek odayı bir tuzağa dönüştürüyordu. Yanlış anlaşılmış öğretilerin çetrefilli tuzağına düşmüş bir kılıçtı bu. Dünyadaki yerini bilmeyen, bahtsız bir yaratıktı.
languages.original_text: And the old Veni led the Domin to the upper decks. And the Domin entered into the officers' chambers. A web of veins adorned the walls, entangling the precious trophies, and statues were bound in intertwining sinews. And high upon a balcony, the dismembered Judge wailed as he attempted to reassemble himself with his pale hands. But his movements merely tightened the tangle of the flesh, turning the chambers into a snare. Such is a blade tangled and trapped in misunderstood teachings. A hapless creature that does not know its place in the world.
